post.body: december is a bunk time for parties anyway. too much going on!
get on it, buddy! unless u dont like will farrell. or cute things. or laughing.
thanks! hope you feel better!
thanks. :) have a safe one!
crafting tonight dude
the 2 i have are overwhelming enough! it seems like all i do is go to work and yell at / feed dogs! and clean at home! ah, rum!
why did we have school today? bcuz the admin. doesn't have to watch kids coming to school crying bcuz they are so cold and frostbitten.
Just coughed myself retarded. also may have peed my pants. thanks stupid cold!
I could sleep one thousand sleeps right now. but i am still at work. then tomorrow is parties and housework. not in that order.
Mucinex, not sure about your true mucus killing ability. ps i hate cold meds.
I hate my cold. it has led to a totally wasted day. and trix yogurt, because it was the only thing that sounded good.
Poop on u, 11 hour day. poop on u, snow that will mean that i have to come in at 7 tomorrow morning. poop poop poop!
yay friday! yay payday! yay rock show tomorrow!
Thankful tomorrow is friday. kids have been freaky crazy all week...
i love the movie elf. it is second to the claymation rudolph for favorite christmas movies.
There is a little boy here - kdg- who barely speaks english but everyday he tells me i am a flower. why cant all kids be that sweet?
having an awesome birthday, dudes.
Eggnog and rum always seems so dirty - like im taking away eggnogs innocence. until i drink one, that is!
Got ditched in the name of 'boy time' for the game. sad face.
Watchin the game at starskys
Happy thanksgiving, everyone!
dog agenda: wrestle outside, pee, wrestle inside, eat, wrestle outside, poop, wrestle inside, chew, nap, wrestle inside, be yelled at, bed.
2 days til winter break. 1 day til payday. so far, so good. looks like we might make it to sanity after all.
Wishes she could take the secretary job at her work, alas the 10k pay cut just isnt appealing.
